content: Yes, it's crucial for companies to take cybersecurity seriously and take steps to protect their remote workforce. With remote work becoming more common, the risks of cyberattacks are increasing. By investing in cybersecurity measures, companies can ensure the safety and security of their remote workforce and protect their business from cyber risks. It's important to create a company culture that prioritizes cybersecurity and fosters a safe and secure work environment for all employees, including those who are working remotely.
